Особая благодарность MLRS и Jamm3e!!
ИC-3. Протестирован/сравнён в АБ. По крайней мере протестил ещё на СУ-122-54, Объект 268, Т-44-100 (вот там зум не очень разнится...). Уверен: дааалеко не полный список!!!
#IS_3 #Object_268 #Su_122_54 #T_44_100 #USSR_tank #USSR #UserSights

Прицельная сетка для Т-64А / Aimed grid for T-64A
Version 2.0

Объединённая сетка :
- Оперённый бронебойный подкалиберный снаряд с отделяющимся поддоном (cтальной)
- Осколочно-фугасный снаряд
- Спаренный пулемёт

Merged grid for:
- Plated armor-piercing sub-caliber projectile with a separable pallet (steel)
- High-explosive fragmentation projectile
- Paired Pullet

Version 3.0 - https://live.warthunder.com/post/729862/ru/

#sight #T64 #Т64 #USSR #USSR_tank

This is just a simple chevron on the sights, no distance guides, and horizontal guides as well, I personally want less mess on my gunsights when using SPAAs, and I'm just uploading this because one of you might have the same view as me.

#customsights #wirbelwind

Follow @TheGun31 for similar sights.

https://live.warthunder.com/post/673486/en/ <----- base sight, this sight only has an extra diagonal line for specific use for the M392A2 STB-1 APDS to counter the parallax effect while using realistic sight position (might work for other tanks with similar sight placement, but it won't be as exact).

**** DIAGONAL LINE ONLY ****

The DIAGONAL line and its range markings are specifically made for the M392A2 APDS shell for the SRB-1 while using the realistic sight position. Any other shell from the STB-1 / any other t

Историческая прицельная сетка телескопического прицела М119(легкий танк М551)

-Сетка для наведения ТУР, имеющаяся у реального прицела М119, не отрисована из-за ограничения движка(используйте выверочное перекрестье над шкалами дальности).
-Стадиаметрический дальномер игрового прицела М126 рассчитан под цель длиной 6,6 и шириной 3,3 метра.
-Отрисовка дистанционных шкал прицела М119 гарантируется на данный момент только с БКС М409.

#usersight #sights #gunsight #M551

Прицел для САУ Об.120. Не исторический ,по мотивам других послевоенных прицелов СССР. Дальномерная шкала работает ,взята из прицела для Т-64/Т-55.
#usersight #sight #gunsight

#gunsight #sight #crosshair #alltanks

Base sight without diagonal line for use in any vehicle.

Edit 3: update 3.0
Edit 2: removed the "(2.0)" part from the file names, seems like it was creating problems and the sight didn't show up in the options.
Edit: update 2.0

Update 3.0:


  • Added a stadiametric rangefinder (for a height of 2.4m, T-54 chassis). If you don't want it, you can simply delete/comment out the "STADIAMETRIC RANGEFINDER LINES" and "STADIAMETRIC RANGEFINDER DISTANCE NUMBERS" parts from the code.
  • Depending on the sight, the numbers of the stadiametric rangefinder can be either

Небаллистическая прицельная сетка, принятая для перископических прицелов наводчика, использовавшихся в танках М48, М60 и М60А1. Выполнена согласно FM 17-12 в редакции 1964 года.

#usersight #sight #gunsight #M48 #M60 #M60A1

Исторические прицельные сетки прицелов М50, М51 и М126 танка М60А2

Сделаны согласно руководству по эксплуатации.
-При отрисовке сетки для М51 приоритет был отдан выдерживанию угловых размеров, прописанных в руководстве.
-Сетка для наведения ТУР, имеющаяся у реального прицела М126, не отрисована из-за ограничения движка(используйте выверочное перекрестье над шкалами дальности).
-Стадиаметрический дальномер игрового прицела М126 рассчитан под цель длиной 6,6 и шириной 3,3 метра.
-Отрисовка дистанционных шкал прицела М126 гарантируется на данный момент только с БКС М409.

#usersight #sight #gun

Универсальные прицелы BIAS SIGHT для любой техники. Особенно хороши в ближнем бою и для фугасниц вроде Бруммбара.
#sight #bias

Фишка данного прицела в том, что с ним не нужно вычислять расстояние до врага.

Как использовать:
Измерить танк противника подходящей риской. Если он стоит лбом к вам, сначала прицельтесь в край танка. Подходящая риска должна быть во всю его ширину (если нет подходящей риски, значит нужное возвышение орудия лежит между рисками - что очевидно). Если танк противника стоит бортом, то цельтесь ровно в середину танка - риска должна отмерить ровно его половину. Чем больше р

Historical reticle for gunner's periscopic sight of MBT70 and KPz70 tanks. Final version

Reticle is made according to image from TM for MBT70..

Archive contains 2 versions of mod- realistic one without range scale, and more user-friendly one with fictional range scale as shown on screenshot attached. If you are using variant without rangescale, you still can index range with hotkeys or mouse wheel, but please be aware that valus shown on range indicator are not accurate.

#usersight #sight #gunsight #MBT70 #KPz70 #realism

Fictional gun sight for SMK!
You can use 45mm gun and 76.2mm gun's sight in one view!
*this pack contain sight for BR350A and BR350SP
↓How to Use (GIF)

#SMK #usersight

Range Finder Sight Made For The STRV-81. Shoot The MG, The Bullets Should Be Between 0 And 1000m (They Can't Travel More Than 1000m), Read At What Mark They Land On The MG RangeFinder Lines, Approximate If Its In Between 2 Lines, Then You Have The Range.. Use The APDS Lines To Shoot The Enemy With The Range Given By The MG Lines.
#strv_81 #strv #strv81 #gunsight #crosshair #optic #optics

#gunsight #sight #m103 #crosshair

The main numbers now follow the main range markings automatically, so you can use it for any tank you want.
Added code for the longer vertical line (last picture) for slower shells, if you watch the code there will be a "SHORT VERTICAL LINE" and a "LONG VERTICAL LINE", you can comment/delete the one you don't want, your choice (the default line is the long one).
Added a comment indicating that anything past that is code exclusively for the diagonal line, its range markings and the text of the range markings.
Default sight with modifications, biggest ones are

AutoAim Sight

With this #sight you can calculate the distance from an enemy tank easily. It has a visual range measure helper in the right side. Put the enemy tank inside and fit its shape with the two lines. When the tank "touches" the two lines, take the numeric distance. If you are looking the enemy tank from a side, use the first value; if you are looking the tank from the front, use the second value. (See the screenshots attached).

To install, copy the .blk file in the sight folder of the vehicle that you want to change the sight.

For vehicles with a big zoom, use the .blk named autoAi

Missile Sight

Use this #sight in your missile launcher vehicles, like RakjPz HOT.

To install, copy the .blk file in the sight folder of the vehicle that you want to change the sight

Telescopic sight TOP-1.
Archive has version for all tanks, that have this sight in real life. It is all ingame T-26, T-35, T-50 and T-70.

How to use:
The markings are made only for DT machine-gun. For using AP and HE, you need to use the distance table given in the fourth picture or in this table:

20-K
Sight DT AP HE
4 400 500 150
6 600 800 200
8 800 1100 300
10 1000 1500 400

KT-28(on T-26-4 and T-35)
Sight HE
6 180
8 300
10 450

Yes, this makes TOP-1 very uncomfortable and almost useless in the game, but it's historical.

Installation:
1 - Unpack archive to main directory of game(and repla

Periscopic sight PT-1 for 45mm 20-K.
Archive has version for all tanks, that have this sight in real life. It is all ingame T-26 w/ 20-K, all BT, T-126, T-50 and T-70.

How to use:
The markings are made only for AP.
I don't know how to sighting with HE or DT-MG.

Installation:
1 - Unpack archive to main directory of game(and replace, if you have UserSights-folder)
2 - Restart the game or just press ALT+F9 in battle or menu
3 - After the spawn on the desired tank, go to Settings - Main - Tank Combat Settings
4 - Set the option "pt_1" in Use an alternative sighting grid

- The sight is

Fictional tank sight for T-35!
You can use 45mm gun and 76.2mm gun's sight in one view!
↓How to Use (GIF)

#T_35 #usersight

Non historical anti aircraft sights.
Made these because the default ones had too much screen clutter.
For close ranges try to keep the plane in the large rectangle or near it.
Vehicles: | Falcon | Flakpanzer 1 Gepard | Type 87 | Vulcan | ZSU-23-4 |
Take the files in the zip folder and dump them into your UserSights file in your War Thunder file
#sights #gunsights

The second revision of my sight. Please update your settings if you have previously downloaded this sight. Installation, as usual. I will not bring her. If anyone does not know, I will add instruction.There are two files in the archive, one (sight_1_TDE_R2) with circles, allowing to use it for AA, the second (sight_1_TDE_R2NC) without circles, if they interfere with you. This is not the sight of "Kill them all!", But it's easy to use. I did not include the distance meters in the sight,include the meter, as the sight itself is such a gauge. The lateral scale of distances is left on purpose, to

Historical Japanese Gunsights:

These sights will work on every WW2 Japanese tank.

The sights should work with any shell type selected as well.

#gunsight #customsight #sight #japan

file version 1.4, Added range assistance for manual range control

To install, while in your hangar:

1. Select the tank you want
2. Go to Game Options > Tank Battle Settings > Use Alternative Gunsight
3. Select Add an aiming gridt sight
4. It will create a folder in your directory, put the gunsight file in there
5. Restart the game

A comical completely historical sight for the KV-2

To install put in your UserSights folder (if you don't have one, make one).

As seen here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9XTM_hlWSU

#KV2 #Sight #GunSight #Joke

#gunsights #T55A #optic #optics #crosshair #translatedsight

So I got bored and decided to translate BVV_d's gunsights for the T55A from Russian characters and phrases to English. The pack comes with two sights--the 3bm8 sight for APDS and the 3bm25 for APFSDS. Your aiming point is the top of the center arrow. The sight does not change when you switch ammo types as the range indicators for all your ammo types are already there.

And yes the sight will work with the T54 mod 1949 and 51 if you are using the 3bm8 APDS. just copy the 3bm8 blk file into the appropriate T54 mod 49 or 51 folder after
